title: Can't evaluate global expressions when ResultIterator is not in the iteration loop
description: For global expressions, such as {params['p1']}, {new DateTime()}, they should always be available and evaluable within the BIRT scripting environment. Currently, the Dte scriptExpression has three types: BEFOREFIRSTROW, AFTERLASTROW, and ONEACHROW.
OB: Currently, when the ResultIterator is not in the iteration loop, global expressions cannot be evaluated within the BIRT scripting environment.
EB: To address this issue, a new GLOBAL expression type should be implemented to allow for the evaluation of these expressions regardless of the row iteration status.
SR: Currently, if you try to evaluate these global expressions when the ResultIterator is not in the iteration loop, a 'QueryResults or its iterator has been closed' DataException is thrown. However, these global expressions are unrelated to the data row iteration.
